main.name: Kumar Gautam
main.description: A competent software developer currently working with Microsoft Corporation as Senior Software Engineer. Possess strong communication, soft, relationship management, analytical and problem-solving skills. Comfortable in interacting with people across hierarchical levels for smooth project execution. Experience of working under cross-cultural and multi-lingual environments.
main.bio: I build large scale distributed systems which help thousands of businesses run seamlessly in Azure cloud. At my leisure, I like to paint my imaginations on canvas & play guitar.
